name: Kingdom Knights Demo Version
description:
Welcome to the official Kingdom Knights Demo Page
In This Demo You Play as a Knight Called The Master as you make your way through the forests of Demo Island to find maps and hopefully new friends 

If you like this demo and wish for there to be a full release of the game then you can donate money towards it (You don't need to but all donations will be appreciated.)

Thanks again
The Creator Of Kingdom Knights :)
